Params.description: Params define Consumer-selectable BTC staking parameters

max_active_finality_providers.description: `max_active_finality_providers` is the maximum number of active finality providers in the BTC staking protocol

min_pub_rand.description: `min_pub_rand` is the minimum amount of public randomness each public randomness commitment should commit

min_slashing_tx_fee_sat.description: `min_slashing_tx_fee_sat` is the minimum amount of tx fee (quantified in Satoshi) needed for the pre-signed slashing tx

slashing_address.description: `slashing_address` is the address that the slashed BTC goes to. The address is in string format on Bitcoin.

slashing_rate.description: `slashing_rate` determines the portion of the staked amount to be slashed, expressed as a decimal (e.g. 0.5 for 50%).
